channel.title: Disconnected
channel.description: Hello, I am working on construction and when I try to make an object (one that has a "addskillxp" code in it) it laggs me out. I can post my code here, but people will steal my work. So if someone is willing to help, then Ill pm the code. and here is my run error code: [code] Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Usman. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 21 at client.addSkillXP(client.java:5976) at client.q10help(client.java:3981) at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:159) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17734) at client.packetProcess(client.java:19242) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:273) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Usman has logged out.[/code]

item.title: Disconnected
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

no it doesnt disconnect if i remove it, but can you please give me a good formula?

Read full topic

item.title: Disconnected
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

what i would do is, search in your client.java for “addSkillXP” Once you find one Follow that Format to add the xp in.
For example, “addSkillXP(50 * smithXpInc, 13);”

if thats not it, When you remove the addskillxp. Does it still disconnect?

Read full topic

item.title: Disconnected
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

okidokie here it is:

if(q10 == 15){ if (playerHasItem(960, 6)) { addSkillXP(2000, 21); deleteItem(960, 1); deleteItem(960, 1); deleteItem(960, 1); deleteItem(960, 1); deleteItem(960, 1); deleteItem(960, 1); setAnimation(898); makeGlobalObject(absX, absY, 7224, 1, 10); resetAnimation(); } else { sM("You don't have 6 planks to make spinning blades"); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Disconnected
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:1, topic:346782”]Hello, I am working on construction and when I try to make an object (one that has a “addskillxp” code in it) it laggs me out. I can post my code here, but people will steal my work. So if someone is willing to help, then Ill pm the code.
and here is my run error code:

Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from Usman. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 21 at client.addSkillXP(client.java:5976) at client.q10help(client.java:3981) at clickingMost.clicking(clickingMost.java:159) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17734) at client.packetProcess(client.java:19242) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:273) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Usman has logged out.[/quote]
If you want help faster, Post your code. People don’t give 2 shits about bits of code, also. If they are smart enough to take the little bit of code that you posted and turn it in to something, Why would you be mad about that? You helped them get in the right direction.

Read full topic
